name: Polluted Flesh
description:
You find yourself stuck within the guts of a cosmic sea creature. That's fine and all, but a ton of ocean waste made its way inside too, and that's disgusting! Help clean the monster up by collecting all of the trash!

A very short, on-rails collector game where you dodge obstacles and collect floating waste. Features 2 endings. 

Controls:

  • WASD / Left Control Stick - Movement
  • Spacebar / A (Controller) / B (Controller) - Confirm
  • Left Shift / X (Controller) / Y (Controller) - View Score (during gameplay)
  • Esc / Menu Button (Controller) - Pause (during gameplay)
